resources.string: Daily Reminder Enabled,\nYou will be notified at given time to fill out your attendance
Reminder Disabled\nYou will not be notified to fill out your attendance
Smart Silent Enabled\nDevice will be automatically silent during lectures
Smart Silent Disabled\nDevice will not be automatically silent during lectures
Select places for each subjects to use auto attendance feature
Configure various Notification Settings such as receiving notifications for new item in shop etc.
Tools used for development purpose.\\nVery Critical in working of app, DO NOT CHANGE IF YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT IT DOES

This is Overall AttendanceCard that shows how much percent attendance you have, attendance card is colored by the percent of attendance if it is close to danger it is shown in "Orange" color and if it is near to the safe percent than it is shown in "Green" color. Click on the card to know more!
Digital Library is the feature for downloading books from online database
Buy/Sell Items is the feature for selling items online! The ads can be seen by anyone using the app while opening this section, Ads can be posted by users. Click on the Card to know more
Visit the Timetable oby clicking on this menu. You can see 2 types of timetable there, Productive view is not Modern but shows every thing at once and there is of course Modern View!
Visit Holidays to know about the Holidays that has been added to the database.
This is the place where you can buy or sell items click on the items to see the details about them. You can call directly to the seller.

Search for items in the Search Box type "Exact KeyWord" to search for item, If you want all the items of the category, just choose the category and leave the search box empty and clicked on the "Search"
To sell items click on this button. Fill in the details ,photos etc and post Ad! and have users notified for each new items you post here.
There is Attendance card! You can use this to see and change attendance.
To See Previous Attendance, touch here and select the date for which you want to change or see Attendance.
Search here for books to download online! No Need to be exact just search anypart of the name to search for it
Click on "Sync Now" to sync the offline database with the online database

Click on Notes to open NoteManager, in which you can see the latest notes as well as old notes all well organized \n\u25CF You can also Edit old notes and create new notes\n\u25CF TIP: Create Note like Subject CRE 2 and put all important notes in it like bring tutorial book etc…

\u25CF Deleting account will remove all the attendance data and account from server as well as locally.\n\u25CF Application will shut down after deleting account, You have to manually start again.\n\u25CF Please proceed by touching \"OK\" to continue Or Click On \"Cancel\" to cancel.
Do you want to Delete Account?
Hello user, Here are sime features of ths app!
Simple and easy to use Attendance Manager to track attendance
Smart Silent is feature that will make your phone silent when you are in the lecture
Works on the GPS location, WiFi and cellular signals to mark your present at you selected location
See Resources Menu from the navigation menu for surprises
Look for book from digital library section for E-books, Photos etc
Buy or sell Items like Books, Vehicles(like bikes, bicycles) etc and have users notify when new Items available in store
Know where you are in required attendance criteria and know available lectures for bunk, Bunked lecutres etc..
That\'s not all!! Discover new features by exploring this app!
Don\'t worry about forgetting things just write them down in notes and then forget them ;, Check here for all your notes!)
To understand what is this card click here to see help now!
You can add new note from here!
You can also use feature of \"Auto Sync\" to turn on Sync in Realtime whenever database is changed by any update on cloud

● Google Certified Android Associate Developer
● Udacity Certified Android Developer

The Student Companion is as the name suggest comes with many features like Attendance Manager which can predict your attendance, Smart Silent, Timetable, Holidays, Auto Attendance, Reminder to fill attendance, Night Mode, etc…

Hey Checkout this awesome app : Student Companion

It has some awesome features like:
●Attendance Manager
●Bunk Planner
●Notes Manager
●Buy Sell Items
●Digital Library and many more…
